## Issue:
- generateMetadata() was calling getServerSession() which tried to 
  create/modify session cookies
- Next.js 15 prohibits cookie modification during metadata generation
- Error occurred on homepage and potentially other pages

## Solution:
- Added readOnly parameter to getOrCreateCookieSession()
- Added readOnly parameter to getServerSession()
- When readOnly=true:
  - Returns temporary session without saving (if new session)
  - Doesn''t update lastVisit or totalVisits (if existing session)
  - Doesn''t attempt to save cookies
- Updated homepage generateMetadata() to call getServerSession(true)

## Files Changed:
- src/lib/session/cookie-session.ts: Added readOnly logic
- src/lib/server/session.ts: Propagate readOnly flag
- src/app/page.tsx: Use readOnly=true in generateMetadata

## Testing:
- Server starts without errors
- Homepage metadata generation works
- Page rendering still creates/updates sessions normally
- Only metadata generation is read-only
